pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://travis-ci.org/python-openxml/python-docx.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/python-openxml/python-docx*python-docx* is a Python library for creating and updating Microsoft Word(.docx) files.More information is available in the `python-docx documentation`_... _`python-docx documentation`: https://python-docx.readthedocs.org/en/latest/
